pages.text: Dragon Mounts Legacy lets you hatch and ride dragons across the skies! $(br2)Explore the world with your loyal companion and dominate the skies with style.
To hatch a dragon, find a Dragon Egg and place it in the correct environment. $(br2)Each type of dragon requires specific conditions to hatch, like lava for a Nether Dragon or water for a Sea Dragon.
Once your dragon hatches, raise it to adulthood by feeding it. $(br2)Craft a Dragon Saddle to ride your dragon, and soar through the skies with its powerful wings!
